attributes.action: Keep animal care in burton and south Derbyshire college !
attributes.background: As an animal care student for the past 2 years I feel saddened at the fact that the government is cutting the course from bsdc and it's disgusting so many other students won't get the amazing opportunity to be educated in animal care ! help us get it back !

rejection.details: The decision of what courses to teach is a matter for the individual college.
